europeana:record.dc:title: Braueria 27 (2000)
europeana:record.dc:creator: Anonym , Arefina-Armitage Tatyana I., Chaibu Prachuab, Chantaramongkol Porntip, Cianficconi Fernanda, Gerecke Reinhard, Krusnik Ciril, Malicky Hans, Morse John, Nimmo Andrew P., Pietro Renato de, Salerno , Sipahiler Füsun, Thamsenanupap Penkhae, Thani Isara, Urbanic Gorazd
europeana:record.dc:description: Inhaltsverzeichnis: Hans Malicky: Dear Trichopterologist 3. Reinhard Gerecke: Water mites as parasites of Trichoptera: invitation for cooperation 4. John Morse: Wallace J. Morse 1916-1999 4. Tatyana I. Arefina-Armitage: Dr.Iya Mikhailovna Levanidova 85 years 5- 7. Andrew P. Nimmo: Fernand Schmid: Personal Memories 9- 10. Renato de Pietro: A new species of Tinodes from Sicily and southern Italy (Trichoptera, Psychomyiidae) 11- 13. Anonym: Theses and Dissertations concerning Trichoptera written by J.C.Morse and his resident, eventual, or former students through May 1999. 14. Fernanda Cianficconi, Salerno: A new species of Athripsodes (Trichoptera: Leptoceridae) from central-southern Italy 15- 16. Gorazd Urbanic, Ciril Krusnik, Hans Malicky: Rhyacophila schmidinarica, a new species of the philopotamoides group (Trichoptera: Rhyacophilidae) from the northern Balkan Peninsula. 17- 18. Hans Malicky: Which caddis larvae construct a new case for pupation? 19- 20. Anonym: List of research workers on Trichoptera 20. Tatyana I. Arefina-Armitage: A new species of the genus Glossosoma Curtis (Trichoptera: Glossosomatidae) from the Russian Far East 21- 22. Füsun Sipahiler: Redescription of Sericostoma flavicorne SCHNEIDER, 1845 and a new species of genus Sericostoma LATREILLE from Turkey (Trichoptera, Sericostomatidae) 23- 25. Füsun Sipahiler: New species and subspecies of Trichoptera from Turkey (Hydroptilidae, Philopotamidae, Phryganeidae, Lepidostomatidae) 26- 28. Hans Malicky, Porntip Chantaramongkol, Prachuab Chaibu, Penkhae Thamsenanupap, Isara Thani: Acht neue Köcherfliegen aus Thailand. (Arbeit Nr. 31 über thailändische Trichoptera) 29- 31. Hans Malicky: Einige neue Köcherfliegen aus Sabah, Nepal, Indien und China (Trichoptera: Rhyacophilidae, Hydrobiosidae, Philopotamidae, Polycentropodidae, Ecnomidae, Psychomyiidae, Hydropsychidae, Brachycentridae, Odontoceridae, Molannidae) 32- 39. Anonym: Trichopterological Literature 39- 47
